page.title: 05CONTINUED
page.content: 2)Across the road is Doy's shop which also sells groceries. Examples of prices and the goods sold are:Tunes 19p per tube,Macs 24p,Loxene Shampoo 15p,Lux Soap 29p,Vasoline 60p,Optrex Â£1.39,Hairspray 72p,Soup 36p,Pot Noodle 48p,Angel Delight 38p, Cranberry Sauce 44p. 3)Bosworth's Butchers shop stands in the centre of the village and sells a wide range of meat e.g. lamb chops(Â£1.15),leg of lamb(Â£1.60), shoulder of lamb(90p). 4)Ladies hairdressing and haberdashery shop takes up two rooms of a house near the centre of the village. {GARAGE} Kerry's garage stands at the south end of the village. In addition to selling petrol, there were cars for sale. Petrol cost Â£1.99. per gallon(July 15) Datsun Cherry Â£1650, Mini Â£1495.
